description.tr: Thales1982 yılında kurulmuş olan Thales S.A. bünyesindeki demiryolu sinyalizasyon çözümleri, telsizler, radarlar, havacılık elektroniği, havacılık, savunma ürünleri markasıdır.İstanbul ve Ankara metrolarına ve Ankara İstanbul hızlı tren hattına sinyalleşme sistemleri sağlamaktadır.Thales S.A. Fransa merkezlidir. 1986 yılından beri Türkiye’de faaliyet göstermektedir.Hissedarları:Fransa devleti (yüzde 26,06)Dassault Aviation (yüzde 26,05)Thales (tasarruf planı çalışanı) (yüzde 2,91)Thales (kendini kontrol eden) (yüzde 1,68)Kurumsal yatırımcılar (yüzde 43,3)
description.en: Thales is a brand for railway signaling solutions, radios, radars, aerospace electronics, aviation, and defense products within Thales S.A., which was founded in 1982. Thales S.A. is headquartered in France. Thales provides signaling systems for the Istanbul and Ankara metros, and the Ankara-Istanbul high-speed train line. The company has been operating in Turkey since 1986. Thales S.A. Shareholders: French State: 26.06%, Dassault Aviation: 26.05%, Thales (employee savings plan): 2.91%, Thales (self-controlling): 1.68%, Institutional investors: 43.3%
description.de: Thales ist eine Marke für Eisenbahnsignalisierungslösungen, Funkgeräte, Radare, Luftfahrtelektronik, Luftfahrt- und Verteidigungsprodukte innerhalb der Thales S.A., die 1982 gegründet wurde. Sie liefert Signalsysteme für die U-Bahnen in Istanbul und Ankara sowie für die Hochgeschwindigkeitsstrecke Ankara-Istanbul. Thales S.A. hat ihren Hauptsitz in Frankreich und ist seit 1986 in der Türkei tätig. Aktionäre: Französischer Staat (26,06 Prozent), Dassault Aviation (26,05 Prozent), Thales (Mitarbeiter-Sparplan) (2,91 Prozent), Thales (Eigenkontrolle) (1,68 Prozent), Institutionelle Anleger (43,3 Prozent)

description.tr: Vertu1998 yılında kurulmuş olan Vertu International Corporation Limited bünyesinde üretilen lüks telefonlar markasıdır.Titanyum, safir kristal ve değerli deri gibi yüksek kaliteli malzemelerden el yapımı cep telefonları üretmektedir.Vertu International Corporation Limited Hong Kong merkezlidir.
description.en: Vertu is a brand of luxury phones produced by Vertu International Corporation Limited, which was founded in 1998. It manufactures handmade mobile phones using high-quality materials such as titanium, sapphire crystal, and precious leather. Vertu International Corporation Limited is headquartered in Hong Kong.
description.de: Vertu ist eine Marke für Luxustelefone, die unter der Vertu International Corporation Limited hergestellt wird. Das Unternehmen wurde 1998 gegründet. Vertu stellt handgefertigte Mobiltelefone aus hochwertigen Materialien wie Titan, Saphirkristall und edlem Leder her. Die Vertu International Corporation Limited hat ihren Hauptsitz in Hongkong.

description.tr: Red Bull1987 yılında Dietrich Mateschitz ve Chaleo Yoovidhya tarafından kurulmuş olan Red Bull Gmbh bünyesinde üretilen enerji içecekleri markasıdır.Uzakdoğu’daki işlevsel içeceklerden esinlenerek kurulan Red Bull’un özünde, kafein ve taurin maddeleri ağırlıklı olarak bulunmaktadır.Red Bull Gmbh Avusturya merkezlidir. Ürünleri 170’ten fazla ülkeye pazarlanmaktadır. Türkiye’de Red Bull Gıda Dağıtım ve Paz. Tic. Ltd. Şti. olarak faaliyet göstermektedir.Bünyesindeki markalar;AfroAfro Cafe Afro CoffeeAir Race World SeriesAlpha TauriAlphatauriAmaphikoAnadolu BreakBad BullBattle Of KingsBc OneBlack BullBullBull RushBulleroBullionaireBullitBullshitCrazy BullÇift BoğaEnergy BullExtreme BullFits Body And MindFlügerlFlying BullFunky BullGivemewingsGives You WingsGolden BullHangar-7KanatlandırııırKirmizi BoğaKırmızı BoğaLa Formula UnaLord BullLunaquaMensanaMonfalcone Sailing AcademyOrganicsPowderhausenPower BullRedRed BullServusShotSpeedy BullTaurexTaurobranTaurusTerra MaterThe Blue Edition Energy DrinkThe Red BulletinToro RojoToro RossoVitalizes Body And MindVodka BullWingsoundsWorb World Of Red BullWorld Sports AwardsWorld Stunt AwardsX-Lounge
description.en: Red Bull is a brand of energy drinks produced by Red Bull GmbH, founded in 1987 by Dietrich Mateschitz and Chaleo Yoovidhya. Inspired by functional drinks from the Far East, Red Bull's core ingredients are caffeine and taurine. Red Bull GmbH is based in Austria. Its products are marketed in over 170 countries. In Turkey, it operates as Red Bull Gıda Dağıtım ve Paz. Tic. Ltd. Şti. Its brands include: Afro, Afro Cafe Afro Coffee, Air Race World Series, Alpha Tauri, Alphatauri, Amaphiko, Anadolu Break, Bad Bull, Battle Of Kings, Bc One, Black Bull, Bull, Bull Rush, Bullero, Bullionaire, Bullit, Bullshit, Crazy Bull, Çift Boğa, Energy Bull, Extreme Bull, Fits Body And Mind, Flügerl, Flying Bull, Funky Bull, Givemewings, Gives You Wings, Golden Bull, Hangar-7, Kanatlandırııır, Kirmizi Boğa, Kırmızı Boğa, La Formula Una, Lord Bull, Lunaqua, Mensana, Monfalcone Sailing Academy, Organics, Powderhausen, Power Bull, Red, Red Bull, Servus, Shot, Speedy Bull, Taurex, Taurobran, Taurus, Terra Mater, The Blue Edition Energy Drink, The Red Bulletin, Toro Rojo, Toro Rosso, Vitalizes Body And Mind, Vodka Bull, Wingsounds, Worb World Of Red Bull, World Sports Awards, World Stunt Awards, X-Lounge
description.de: Red Bull ist eine Energy-Drink-Marke, die von der Red Bull GmbH hergestellt wird, welche 1987 von Dietrich Mateschitz und Chaleo Yoovidhya gegründet wurde. Red Bull wurde von funktionellen Getränken aus Fernost inspiriert und enthält hauptsächlich Koffein und Taurin. Die Red Bull GmbH hat ihren Hauptsitz in Österreich. Ihre Produkte werden in über 170 Ländern vermarktet. In der Türkei ist das Unternehmen als Red Bull Gıda Dağıtım ve Paz. Tic. Ltd. Şti. tätig. Marken des Unternehmens sind: Afro, Afro Cafe, Afro Coffee, Air Race World Series, Alpha Tauri, Alphatauri, Amaphiko, Anadolu Break, Bad Bull, Battle Of Kings, Bc One, Black Bull, Bull, Bull Rush, Bullero, Bullionaire, Bullit, Bullshit, Crazy Bull, Çift Boğa, Energy Bull, Extreme Bull, Fits Body And Mind, Flügerl, Flying Bull, Funky Bull, Givemewings, Gives You Wings, Golden Bull, Hangar-7, Kanatlandırııır, Kirmizi Boğa, Kırmızı Boğa, La Formula Una, Lord Bull, Lunaqua, Mensana, Monfalcone Sailing Academy, Organics, Powderhausen, Power Bull, Red, Red Bull, Servus, Shot, Speedy Bull, Taurex, Taurobran, Taurus, Terra Mater, The Blue Edition Energy Drink, The Red Bulletin, Toro Rojo, Toro Rosso, Vitalizes Body And Mind, Vodka Bull, Wingsounds, Worb World Of Red Bull, World Sports Awards, World Stunt Awards, X-Lounge

description.tr: Popeyes1972 yılında kurulmuş olan Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen Inc. bünyesindeki restoranlar zinciri markasıdır.Ürünleri baharatlı tavuk, kızarmış karides ve diğer yöresel ürünlerden oluşmaktadır.Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen Inc. Amerika merkezlidir. Dünya çapında 4 bine yakın restorana sahiptir. Türkiye’de 2007 yılından beri TAB Gıda ile 40’tan fazla şehirde faaliyet göstermektedir.
description.en: Popeyes is a restaurant chain brand under Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen Inc., which was founded in 1972. Its products include spicy chicken, fried shrimp, and other regional items. Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen Inc. is headquartered in the United States. It has nearly 4,000 restaurants worldwide. In Turkey, it has been operating in more than 40 cities with TAB Gıda since 2007.
description.de: Popeyes ist eine Restaurantkettenmarke, die zur Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen Inc. gehört und 1972 gegründet wurde. Die Produktpalette umfasst scharfes Hähnchen, frittierte Garnelen und andere regionale Spezialitäten. Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen Inc. hat ihren Hauptsitz in den USA, genauer gesagt in Miami, Florida. Weltweit betreibt das Unternehmen über 3.700 Restaurants. In der Türkei ist Popeyes seit 2007 in Zusammenarbeit mit TAB Gıda in über 40 Städten tätig und verfügt über fast 500 Restaurants.
